resources.string: The objective of the game is to rearrange the tiles such that they are arranged 1 through 8 as shown below:
In order to play; move the phone in the direction in which you want to move the tile into the blank space.
For example, in the situation shown below, Move the ‘2 tile’ up by moving the phone up.
The beginning of every motion must be done in a strong but swift motion immediately followed by a return to center. After each move, you must wait at center for 2 seconds before continuing.
If stuck, for a hint move the phone up and down in the z-direction.
To undo a move, press the undo button.
